definitions.text: of the greatest possible degree or extent or intensity

examples: to the last measure of human endurance
whether they were accomplices in the last degree or a lesser one was...to be determined individually

definitions.text: (comparatives of `far') most remote in space or time or order
examples: had traveled to the farthest frontier
don't go beyond the farthermost (or furthermost) tree
explored the furthest reaches of space
the utmost tip of the peninsula
